about.title: Driven by Trusted
about.desc1: At NL Property, we believe that finding a rental home in the Netherlands should be simple, honest, and stress-free. Thatâ€™s why weâ€™ve created a platform thatâ€™s fully focused on rentersâ€”no agents, no complicated steps, no hidden fees.

hero.desc: Discover and compare rental options from trusted companies all in one place. Browse listings, choose what suits you best, and book directly. We make it simple, secure, and seamless. A small service fee may apply.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose For HuurScanner
whyChoose.desc: At HuurScanner, we believe that finding a rental home should be simple and stress-free, even if you donâ€™t speak Dutch. Our platform is built to make your search fast, easy, and accessible for everyone. Whether you're an expat, international student, or just looking for a new place, HuurScanner helps you find homes that match your budget and location. With smart filters, regular updates, and the ability to contact landlords directly, you're always one step closer to your next home. No hassle, no confusion, just a smooth path to renting.

item.title: How does renting work through Huurscanner?
item.desc: With Huurscanner, creating an account is quick and easy. Once you're signed up, you can instantly browse available rental listings, apply filters, and respond to properties. Everything is arranged safely online, without hassle.

item.title: Is Huurscanner a reliable platform?
item.desc: Absolutely. At Huurscanner, we only work with verified landlords and trusted partners. This ensures a safe and secure rental experience, every time.

item.title: Can I view a property before renting through Huurscanner?
item.desc: Yes, in most cases you can easily request a viewing. After you respond to a property, the landlord will contact you to schedule an appointment before you make a final decision.

item.title: How can I find affordable rental homes through Huurscanner?
item.desc: Huurscanner helps you quickly find affordable rentals using smart filters like maximum rent, property type, and location. Youâ€™ll instantly see up-to-date listings from trusted landlords, with no hidden fees â€” making it easy to find a home that fits your budget.

item.title: Can I find rental properties in Amsterdam, Rotterdam, or Utrecht through Huurscanner?
item.desc: Yes, Huurscanner offers new listings every day in top cities like Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Utrecht, The Hague, and more. Thanks to our advanced search filters, you can instantly view available properties per city â€” from studios to spacious apartments, all from verified landlords.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions of NL Property

points.1.1: Subscriber: the consumer who has subscribed to Rentalerts.nl.
points.1.2: Subscription: the agreement established between the consumer and Rentalerts.nl, whereby the consumer creates an account with Rentalerts.nl for a fee to use its services.
points.1.3: Subscription Fee: the amount the consumer must pay to Rentalerts.nl to access its services.
points.1.4: Account: a personalized username combined with a password that allows the consumer to access Rentalerts.nl's services.
points.1.5: Cooling-off Period: the legal period of 14 (fourteen) days within which a consumer may cancel an agreement without giving any reason.
points.1.6: Consumer: a natural person who is not acting in the exercise of a profession or business.
points.1.7: Information: rental properties offered for rent by or on behalf of landlords on the relevant website, the link to which we email to you.
points.1.8: Services: all information offered to the consumer by Rentalerts.nl via the website.
points.1.9: Customer Service: the customer service of Rentalerts.nl, reachable at support@rentalerts.nl.
points.1.10: Agreement: the remote agreement concluded via the website between Rentalerts.nl and the consumer, whereby the consumer purchases one or more services from Rentalerts.nl.
points.1.11: Rentalerts.nl: the private company Metis International B.V., operating under the name Rentalerts.nl, located at P.O. Box 56822, 1040 AV Amsterdam, registered in the trade register of the Chamber of Commerce under number 91200725.
points.1.12: Landlord: a natural or legal person offering a property for rent through the platform.
points.1.13: Website: the website operated by Rentalerts.nl, accessible at www.rentalerts.nl.

2.title: Article 2: Applicability
2.content: These general terms and conditions apply to the agreement between the consumer and Rentalerts.nl unless otherwise agreed in writing with the consumer.

3.title: Article 3: The Service(s)
3.content: By subscribing, the consumer gains access to the Rentalerts.nl platform, where available rental offers can be viewed. This information is generated using various scrapers.

points.4.1: Rentalerts.nl has no obligation to guarantee the consumer will successfully find a rental property.
points.4.2: Rentalerts.nl is not responsible for the accuracy, correctness, or completeness of the information. Rentalerts.nl is not involved in creating the information and merely acts as a conduit without influencing its content.

points.5.1: The agreement is established once the consumer accepts the offer from Rentalerts.nl and meets the required conditions.
points.5.2: Once the consumer electronically accepts the offer, Rentalerts.nl promptly confirms the acceptance electronically. The invoice for the first month is typically sent via email 14 to 21 days after subscription activation, and payment must be made through the link provided in that email. The subscription is concluded for a period of one month and is automatically renewed for another month unless canceled.

points.6.1: Rentalerts.nl will not increase subscription fees during the subscription unless due to legally mandated price changes. Price increases will not take place within the first three months of subscription activation, and Rentalerts.nl will provide prior notice of any increases.
points.6.2: All service prices are in euros, including VAT and other government-imposed charges.
points.6.3: Consumers are always obligated to pay all amounts due for the received services.
points.6.4: Payments must be made immediately upon receiving the invoice unless otherwise agreed. The first month's invoice is usually sent via email 14 to 21 days after subscription activation, and payment must be made through the link provided.
points.6.5: If the consumer fails to fulfill payment obligations after a reminder and an additional period of 14 (fourteen) days, statutory interest will be charged on the outstanding amount as per the consumerâ€™s country's legislation. Rentalerts.nl may also charge extrajudicial collection fees as determined by local law. Rentalerts.nl reserves the right to adjust these amounts and percentages in favor of the consumer.

points.7.1: The agreement is entered into for an indefinite period unless otherwise stated or explicitly agreed in writing.
points.7.2: The consumer may terminate the agreement at any time with a notice period of 30 days, effective the day after Rentalerts.nl receives the termination notice.
points.7.3: Rentalerts.nl may also terminate the agreement with a 30-day notice period unless otherwise agreed or if legal circumstances justify immediate termination.
points.7.4: Termination does not affect financial obligations, including outstanding payments for services already provided by Rentalerts.nl and any costs incurred during the notice period.
points.7.5: Rentalerts.nl may immediately terminate the subscription if the consumer has significant payment arrears or if required by law.

points.8.1: The subscriber has the right to cancel the agreement within 14 days without stating any reason.
points.8.2: The subscriber has a 14-day cooling-off period from the start of the subscription.
points.8.3: To comply with the withdrawal period, it is sufficient for the consumer to send a notice before the withdrawal period expires.
points.8.4: If the consumer cancels the agreement, Rentalerts.nl will refund all payments within 14 days from the day it was informed of the decision, provided payment was already made.
points.8.5: To exercise the right of withdrawal, the consumer must notify Rentalerts.nl through an explicit statement (e.g., by post, fax, or email).

points.9.1: Rentalerts.nl is only liable for direct damages resulting from intentional misconduct or gross negligence by Rentalerts.nl, its directors, or employees.
points.9.2: Rentalerts.nl is not liable for indirect damages, including consequential damage, lost profits, missed savings, data loss, business disruption, or damage to third parties.
points.9.3: The total liability for direct damages is limited to the amount paid by the consumer for the service that caused the damage.

points.10.1: Rentalerts.nl has the right to amend these terms and conditions. Significant changes will be communicated to the consumer.

points.11.1: Rentalerts.nl reserves the right to sell or share consumer data with third parties for marketing, research, or business purposes.

points.12.1: All intellectual property rights regarding the website and services belong to Rentalerts.nl and/or its licensors.

points.13.1: This agreement is governed by Dutch law.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy of Rent Alerts
privacy.intro: Metis International B.V. operates the www.rentalerts.nl website, which provides a service that makes looking for an apartment easier and faster. The service contains sending links to newly available rental homes to our customers.
privacy.notice: This page is used to inform website visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service, the Rent Alerts website.
privacy.consent: If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation with this policy. The Personal Information that we collect are used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.
privacy.terms_note: The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.

information_collection.title: Information Collection and Use
information_collection.description: For a better experience while using our Service, we may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to your name, phone number, and postal address. The information that we collect will be used to contact or identify you.

log_data.title: Log Data
log_data.description: We want to inform you that whenever you visit our Service, we collect information that your browser sends to us that is called Log Data. This may include your IP address, browser version, pages visited, time/date, duration, and other statistics.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: Cookies are files with a small amount of data that is commonly used as an anonymous unique identifier. Our website uses cookies to collect information and improve our Service. You can accept or refuse them. Refusing may limit some features.

service_providers.title: Service Providers
service_providers.description: We may employ third-party companies and individuals to facilitate, provide, analyze, or support our Service. They have access to your Personal Information to perform tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to misuse it.

security.title: Security
security.description: We value your trust and strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information. However, no internet transmission or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute safety.

external_links.title: Links to Other Sites
external_links.description: Our Service may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices or content. We recommend reviewing their policies.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.description: Our Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. If we learn that a child has provided us with personal information, we delete it. Parents can contact us to take appropriate action.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Check this page periodically. Changes take effect immediately after posting.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, contact us at support@rentalerts.nl.

cookie.title: Cookie Statement Metis International B.V.
cookie.intro: Rentalerts.nl means the private company Metis International B.V., operating under the name Rentalerts.nl, located at P.O. Box 56822, 1040 AV Amsterdam, registered in the trade register of the Chamber of Commerce under number 91200725. We value the privacy of visitors to our website www.rentalerts.nl and comply with the Dutch Data Protection Act and the General Data Protection Regulation. This statement explains our cookie policy for www.rentalerts.nl.

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small, simple text files that are placed on your computer, tablet, or mobile phone via our website when you visit it. The cookies we use do not store personal data such as your password, name, address, or age. They only remember your preferences and interests. We use cookies for various reasons. Below you will find more about the 3 different categories of cookies that Metis International B.V. uses on the website www.rentalerts.nl.

necessaryCookies.title: Necessary cookies
necessaryCookies.description: Some cookies are necessary for our website to function. These cookies contribute to secure browsing and use of the websiteâ€™s functionalities. Think of staying logged in while navigating between pages and remembering your cookie preferences. If your browser does not accept cookies from www.rentalerts.nl, you may not be able to use the website or your personal dashboard fully.

statsCookies.title: Statistics cookies
statsCookies.description: We strive for the best possible user experience. To achieve this, we use cookies that collect information about how our website is used. On our website, we use the following statistics cookies:

externalCookies.title: External cookies
externalCookies.description: We find it important to share only relevant information with you. We therefore use cookies that tell us something about your user profileâ€”both on our website and on external websites. For example, if you viewed a certain page on our website, you may see an ad for that page on another website. On our site, we use the following external cookies:
externalCookies.note: Via special buttons from these platforms, you can easily share content from our site. For example, the Facebook 'Like' button and linking those preferences to visits to other websites. This is made possible by cookies. More information about what these platforms collect can be found on their respective websites.

cookieOverview.title: Cookie overview
cookieOverview.description: We strive to keep this overview as up-to-date as possible. Last updated: 06-10-2022.

blockOrRemove.title: How can you block or remove cookies?
blockOrRemove.description: Would you prefer that www.rentalerts.nl not place cookies? Then you can block or delete them via your browserâ€™s privacy settings. The site may function slower or not at all as a result. See the explanation under 'Necessary cookies'.

blockCookies.title: Blocking cookies
blockCookies.description: Want to prevent new cookies from being placed? Then block cookie storage on your device. You can block all cookies, specific types of cookies, or cookies from specific websites through your browser's privacy settings. Blocking cookies does not remove existing ones. You should also delete them manually with tools like HitmanPro or MalwareBytes.

deleteCookies.title: Deleting cookies
deleteCookies.description: Want to delete all cookies on your device? You can, but be aware that doing so may reduce your browsing convenienceâ€”some settings will no longer be remembered, and you might miss relevant offers. After every internet session, new cookies will be placed again unless youâ€™ve blocked them. You can find the delete option in your browserâ€™s toolbar. Visit the sites for Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome, or Safari for more info. Safari blocks advertiser cookies by default, but you can change this in Preferences â†’ Privacy.
